content: सित {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [सो-क्त] {@--1@} White. {@--2@} Bound, tied, fastened, fettered. {@--3@} Surrounded. {@--4@} Ascertained, known. {@--5@} Finished, ended. --तः {@--1@} White colour. {@--2@} The bright half of a lunar month. {@--3@} The planet Venus. {@--4@} An arrow. --तं {@--1@} Silver. {@--2@} Sandal. {@--3@} Radish.
